title: Zoe Ult and warding
body: Why can't you place a ward during Zoe's ult? I feel this would be super useful for her, especially in the support role. It doesn't add a lot of power to her besides some extra vision over walls, which she already gets when she ults. Could this be something we change? I noticed this once I started to play a bit of Zoe, especially in the support role.{{champion:142}}

replies.body: She already has so much going for her, why does she need that? Even if it is situational, it's unnecessary. Other champs have to move into possible danger to ward. She doesn't get a free pass from that
lb can ward during her distortion tho.
